PtSituationElement.Description: From Wednesday 12th April until Monday 15th May 2023 Kings Parade will be closed in both directions

Advice.Details:
Routes 4/4A will operate as normal from Liverpool ONE Bus Station then via Wapping, Sefton Street then as normal routes (omitting Salthouse Quay, Gower Street, Kings Parade and Mariners Wharf)
Routes 4/4A will operate as normal from Greenbank to Sefton Street then will continue via Sefton Street, Chaloner Street, Queens Wharf, Monarchs Quay, Kings Parade and resume normal route to Liverpool ONE Bus Station (omitting Mariners Wharf and Kings Parade).

PtSituationElement.Description: Lickers Lane, Whiston will be closed in various phases from Monday 13th February to Friday 12th May 2023.

Advice.Details: Route 99 will operate as normal from Whiston Station, Pennywood Drive via Pennywood Drive then via Lickers Lane, Windy Arbor Road, Dragon Lane to Cross Lane and resume normal route to Prescot Bus Station (omitting a section of Lickers Lane, Cumber Lane, Milton Avenue and Dragon Drive).
buses will be late sorry guys
